original.headline: Black Friday Blowout! Up to 70% Off Everything!
original.body: Do not miss our biggest sale of the year. Grab jaw-dropping deals before they are gone. Free shipping on orders over $50. Use code FRIDAY70 at checkout.

explanation.explanation: The culturally adapted version of the campaign is more suitable for the Japanese market due to its emphasis on respect, harmony, and quality. The headline was changed from 'Black Friday Blowout' to '秋の感謝セール' (Autumn Thanksgiving Sale) to convey a sense of gratitude and respect, which is highly valued in Japanese culture. The call-to-action (CTA) was also modified from 'Shop Now' to '期間限定のお得なオファーを詳しく見る' (See the limited-time offer in detail) to encourage customers to take a more thoughtful and considered approach, rather than acting impulsively. Additionally, the body of the campaign was rewritten to include polite language and phrases, such as '季節のご挨拶を申し上げます' (We offer you our seasonal greetings) and '心からお客様に喜んでいただきたい' (We hope you will be delighted from the heart), to create a sense of harmony and respect. These changes will help to build trust and rapport with Japanese customers, ultimately leading to a more successful campaign.
